website_summaries.verdict: A great option that provides testing for 10 different drugs.
pros: Delivers qualitative detection of multiple drugs and drug metabolites in a person's urine
Provides an ideal blend of reliability and affordability

customer_reviews.title: Results invalid
customer_reviews.text: All test I received did not work. Gave it till I used last one to write review to ensure it wasn’t just a single test. All I had bought came out like this. Disappointed that I wasted money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Shyla Cedano

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about these. Sometimes the lines are really faint which makes me question the accuracy. I would not recommend them due to the uncertainty.
customer_reviews.author: ELC

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 and the first 2 come out inconclusive so a total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Strevell

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Well, what can I say? It works. The confession matched the results.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Testing positive for Amohetamines and Ectasy. Not doing either one
customer_reviews.author: Lindzie Lown

customer_reviews.title: Sober Living Approved. 100% Accurate and Fast Results!!
customer_reviews.text: Recommend for any Sober Living, or as a Quick test for Rehab facilities. I use this product for testing my clients/residents at my sober living and with a lot of dip tests results can come inaccurate and slow. These have been 100% accurate every time and give super quick results faster than a lot of drug test products in its category. Highly recommended as a reliable and affordable solution for testing!
customer_reviews.author: FunnyPony666

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and read
customer_reviews.text: All as promised..shipped on time. Easy to use and read.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Walters

customer_reviews.title: Dont know if that is good or bad
customer_reviews.text: It works. Dont know if that is good or bad. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: pukemon

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: It showed positive for all but two drugs. I have never taken any drug before. I bought it for my son he used one and I took one. Can't be sure if his is accurate because mine was not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. I can only assume was correct. I did have PCP show up on the test and I don't do pcp and never have in my entire life. I think it may have been a reaction from a medication I'm on? I took my drug test and passed so I'm not sure what was going on there.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Kahl

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty well, except for the part where I feel like there was the veeeery slightest positive for PCP, which I've definitely never done. Other than that, works great
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Waste.
customer_reviews.text: It came on time, but had negative results even after the subject said he smoked weed not even 3 hours before the test....if you want accuracy, go tons drug testing center or your dr.
customer_reviews.author: A buyer

customer_reviews.title: accurate results
customer_reviews.text: The line for TCH kept coming up faint for me even though I have never used marijuana. However, every other line came in very dark each time I tested and I was indeed clean.
customer_reviews.author: B

product_meta.title: 10 Panel Dip Drug Testing Kit, Test for 10 Different Drugs. (2 Pack)
